attributes.title: Are you serious
attributes.review: What is the purpose of this app other than to take up space for more deserving apps. I cannot believe the things that are acceptable in the App Store now a days. I remember the time when apps were held to a higher standard now it seems as if anything will get in.

attributes.title: BLM

This app definitely needs some improvement. I would not recommend this app at all, and if I could give it a 0 star I would.
